question: There are currently {n1} {c1} balls, {n2} {c2} balls, and {n3} {c3} balls in the {place}. {c1} balls cost {cur}{p1}, {c3} balls cost {cur}{p3}, and {c2} balls cost {cur}{p2}. The {place} has a promotion that gives a {disc}% discount on all purchases. How much will the {place} have received after all the balls are sold?
